DOC.detailed_description: Prospective randomise interventional study . Healthy volunteer position supine undergo preoxygenation tidal volume breathe 3 minute use technique turn . The sequence technique volunteer randomise advance . Investigators instructed ensure good mask seal throughout test period . At end 3 minute preoxygenation period , brief breath hold , volunteer exhale reservoir tubing , allow fractional expire oxygen concentration ( FeO2 ) determine ( primary outcome ) use calibrate gas analyser . The technique assess choose method preoxygenation commonly available clinician prehospital environment : 1 . Continuous Positive Airway Pressure mode fractional inspired oxygen concentration ( FiO2 ) 100 % use portable ventilator . 2 . Bag-valve-mask device ( BVM ) 15 l/min oxygen flow . 3 . Non-rebreather mask ( NRM ) device 15 l/min oxygen flow . Volunteers also ask indicate subjective ease breathing technique ( secondary outcome ) use visual analogue scale ( VAS ) .
